title: I take it back Random Urf was not the solution
body:
This is just the usual "one team has broken champs" only now you had no choice in whether or not you wanted to play something also busted to have a shot at being competitive.

These games are **_all_** hilarious one-sided stomps.
Not too much fun.

replies.body:
i posted the same thread about the same shit saying enemy team has zed and jax and we have ap aatrox.

got downvoted to hell by bronze idiots
I think a simple ban phase before assigning champs may help fix a little bit of the issue but idk. Seeing Wukong every single game is beyond annoying.
to be fair we would need at least 30 bans lol
I'd rather see wukong than ap malphite...seen those more.

I don't think so. I think the game mode is just absolutely 0 fun now. the real fix was just to not trot URF out so often so it doesn't wear too thin. or do a little balance work on huge outliers like Sona or Xin. 

The entire fun of the game mode is getting to pick a champ you can have a lot of fun trying to outplay with, without the ability for me to pick Azir or you to pick whatever your fav is, it's just a shitty feeling stompfest.
Dont understand why they dont just disable some champs in it really. That or simply balance power in them. Dont care how long it will take,. there doing for boom bots.. why not urf?

Because according to their stats the "OP" champions aren't even that OP. There's a LOT of strong champions that didn't get any limelight last time around because everyone were playing the same 10 champions.

give us bans. games is fun again. you cant deal with shit like fiora shaco sona without losing ur sanity
They really are mostly one sided stomps.

> [{quoted}](name=CB Thea Queen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7m3XroEq,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-23T22:06:31.371+0000)
>
> 
> These games are **_all_** hilarious one-sided stomps.
> Not too much fun.


URF in a nutshell no matter what you do to 'fix' it.
This is clearly the worst random game mode they have done.

It was exceptionally fun going against Tryndamere, EKKO, JAYCE, LULU, AND ZILEAN IN ONE GAME! I feel like a ban phase would at least help since it allows us to get SOME of the super op champs away. You know the ones, that one champ that you wish you had, but someone else got them and carried almost entirely by themself.

It all depends on team comp, but still. My friend got THREE pentakills as Rengar in a game today.
Yeah a ban phase would be nice, some things just don't need to played lol.

It shouldn't be all random; they should try to balance power (taking into account your experience with that champ and that champ's average aram performance compared to their regular performance), and match it so that both teams have equally good comps.
"Hilarious one-sided stomps" are, by their very definition, hilarious and fun. If you can't have fun without winning, go play beginner bots.
Not winning and getting beat so bad you didn't play are two very different things.

well the name is miss leading

because its not random

which it should be

with 1 exception, can't get the same champ you just got for your next 2-3 games
just to make sure someone's doesn't end up playing urgot 50 games in a row
Idk I had pretty fun games and even won against the most disgusting enemy comp xD

I had a couple of good games where either team could have won with the right decision. I lost a couple of games because we got outscaled late game. Some champions are way better than expected - some suck. Sometimes you get a decent tank that wouldn't have been picked in a normal URF mode. I only had a few really onesided stomps.
